Wild Poliwhirl, Poliwrath, Politoed, Slowpoke, Slowbro, Slowking and Hariyama }} ===Description=== The Kings Rock is a type of [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item]] that can be first encountered in the [[Kanto]] Region, but is first usable in the [[Johto]] Region. ===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Poliwhirl.png|40px]] Poliwhirl || [[File:Politoed.png|40px]] Politoed |- | [[File:Slowpoke.png|40px]] Slowpoke || [[File:Slowking.png|40px]] Slowking |} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
